patterns.name: URL/Detail Fabrication
patterns.description: Tendency to cite specific URLs, paths, or technical details that sound plausible but haven't been verified. Should always confirm infrastructure details exist before stating them as fact.

instances.context: Referenced non-existent dashboard URL (jaekel.mcmastergdsc.ca/dashboard/) for ConnectedDrivingPipelineV4 when results are actually SSH-only local files
